        id - The identifier of the flight
        velocity - The velocity of the plane
        altitude - The altitude of the plane
        bearing - The bearing of the plane
        currentGame - The game object associated with the plane
        uniqueNetworkObjectId - A unique id for the plane that is the same across all clients in a networked game
